setting.help: Enable this option to calculate distances between locations using the Geopy library. Geopy provides robust tools for geocoding and calculating distances based on geographical coordinates. This can be particularly useful for distance-based shipping rates or logistics calculations.

field.name: geopy_measure_method
field.string: Enable to calculate distance using Geopy
